org.ligoj.app.dao

Interface ParameterValueRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<ParameterValue,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<ParameterValue,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<ParameterValue,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<ParameterValue>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<ParameterValue,java.lang.Integer>, org.ligoj.bootstrap.core.dao.RestRepository<ParameterValue,java.lang.Integer>

    public interface ParameterValueRepository
extends org.ligoj.bootstrap.core.dao.RestRepository<ParameterValue,java.lang.Integer>
    ParameterValue repository

    • Method Detail

      • getParameterValues

        @Query(value="SELECT p FROM ParameterValue p LEFT JOIN p.node n0 LEFT JOIN n0.refined n1 LEFT JOIN n1.refined n2 WHERE n0.id = :node OR n1.refined.id = :node OR n2.refined.id = :node")
java.util.List<ParameterValue> getParameterValues(java.lang.String node)
        Return all parameter values associated to a node, including the ones from the parent.
        Parameters:
        node - The node identifier.
        Returns:
        All parameter values associated to a node.

      • getSubscriptionParameterValue

        @Query(value="SELECT p.data FROM ParameterValue p, Subscription s INNER JOIN s.node service LEFT JOIN p.subscription subscription LEFT JOIN p.node n0 LEFT JOIN n0.refined n1 LEFT JOIN n1.refined n2 WHERE s.id = ?1 AND (subscription = s OR  n0 = service OR n1.refined = service OR n2.refined = service) AND p.parameter.id = ?2")
java.lang.String getSubscriptionParameterValue(int subscription,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       java.lang.String parameter)
        Return a parameter value related to the subscription to the given service for a project.
        Parameters:
        subscription - the subscription identifier.
        parameter - The parameter identifier.
        Returns:
        the associated parameter value as String

      • findAllBySubscription

        @Query(value="SELECT p FROM ParameterValue p, Subscription s INNER JOIN s.node service INNER JOIN FETCH p.parameter LEFT JOIN p.subscription subscription LEFT JOIN p.node n0 LEFT JOIN n0.refined n1 LEFT JOIN n1.refined n2 WHERE s.id = ?1 AND (subscription = s OR  n0 = service OR n1.refined = service OR n2.refined = service)")
java.util.List<ParameterValue> findAllBySubscription(int subscription)
        Return all parameters (name and raw value) associated to a subscription. Sensitive parameters are returned.
        Parameters:
        subscription - the subscription identifier.
        Returns:
        all parameters associated to a subscription.

      • findAllSecureBySubscription

        @Query(value="SELECT v FROM ParameterValue v, Subscription s INNER JOIN s.node service INNER JOIN FETCH v.parameter AS param LEFT JOIN v.subscription subscription LEFT JOIN v.node n0 LEFT JOIN n0.refined n1 LEFT JOIN n1.refined n2 WHERE s.id = ?1 AND param.secured != TRUE AND (subscription = s OR  n0 = service OR n1.refined = service OR n2.refined = service)")
java.util.List<ParameterValue> findAllSecureBySubscription(int subscription)
        Return all non secured parameters (name and raw value) associated to a subscription. Sensitive parameters are not returned.
        Parameters:
        subscription - the subscription identifier.
        Returns:
        all parameters associated to a subscription.

      • deleteByNode

        @Modifying
 @Query(value="DELETE ParameterValue WHERE    parameter.id IN (SELECT id FROM Parameter WHERE owner.id = :node OR owner.id LIKE CONCAT(:node, \':%\')) OR subscription.id IN (SELECT id FROM Subscription WHERE node.id = :node OR node.id LIKE CONCAT(:node, \':%\')) OR node.id = :node OR node.id LIKE CONCAT(:node, \':%\') ")
void deleteByNode(java.lang.String node)
        Delete all parameter values related to the given node or sub-nodes.
        Parameters:
        node - The node identifier.

      • findOneVisible

        @Query(value="FROM ParameterValue v INNER JOIN FETCH v.node n WHERE v.id=:id AND n IS NOT NULL AND ((EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemRoleAssignment ra INNER JOIN ra.role r WHERE ra.user.id = :user     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemAuthorization a WHERE a.role = r AND a.pattern = \'.*\'          AND a.type = org.ligoj.bootstrap.model.system.SystemAuthorization$AuthorizationType.API))) OR EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM DelegateNode d WHERE (n.id LIKE CONCAT(d.name, \':%\') OR d.name=n.id) AND ((receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.USER    AND receiver=:user)  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.GROUP   AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheGroup cg   WHERE receiver = cg.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheMembership cm INNER JOIN cm.group g WHERE cm.user.id = :user          AND (g.description = cg.description OR g.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cg.description)))))  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.COMPANY AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheCompany cc WHERE receiver = cc.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheUser cu INNER JOIN cu.company c   WHERE cu.id = :user          AND (c.description = cc.description OR c.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cc.description)))))) AND (d.canWrite = true OR d.canAdmin = true)))")
ParameterValue findOneVisible(int id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 java.lang.String user)
        Return the parameter with the given identifier and associated to a visible and also writable node by the given user. Only entities linked to a node can be deleted this way.
        Parameters:
        id - The parameter identifier.
        user - The user principal requesting this parameter.
        Returns:
        The visible parameter or null when not found.
